mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select apply.applydate writedate,apply.normal_name subject,TRUNC((sysdate-apply.normal_birth)/365) plan_idx,normalmember.gender,member.addr local1,apply."CHECK" min_age,apply.member_idx com_idx from apply,normalmember,member where apply.member_idx=normalmember.member_idx and normalmember.member_idx=member.idx and apply.notice_idx=#{idx} and apply.status='활성') a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select count(*) from apply where notice_idx=#{idx} and status='활성'
select * from member m, normalmember n where m.idx = n.member_idx and m.idx = #{member_idx}
select count(*) from apply where notice_idx = #{notice_idx} and member_idx = #{member_idx}

select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select n.idx,n.subject, n.com_name, n.period, n.writedate, n.pay_hour , n.starttime, n.finishtime ,a."CHECK" AS ref from notice n, apply a where n.idx = a.notice_idx and member_idx = #{member_idx} and a.status='활성' order by a."CHECK" asc, a.applydate desc) a) b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select count(*) from apply where member_idx=#{idx} and status='활성'
